products.name: Intel 13th Gen Core i5 13600K Raptor Lake Processor
products.description: The Intel Core i5-13600K 3.5 GHz 14-Core LGA 1700 Processor will boost your productivity, gaming, and content production. This 13th-generation desktop CPU expands on the Hybrid Core design and Intel 7 process by packing 14 cores onto a single chip, four more than the prior generation, while still fitting the LGA 1700 socket. The Core i5-13600K is designed to deliver powerful performance for everyday workloads, with eight low-voltage Efficient-cores handling background tasks for multitasking and six 3.5 GHz Performance-cores powering programs and games. The built-in Intel Thread Director guarantees that the two function in unison by dynamically and intelligently distributing tasks to the appropriate core at the appropriate moment. With 24MB of cache and a Turbo Boost Max 2.0 clock of 5.1 GHz, this CPU is designed to handle a wide range of workloads. This CPU may also be overclocked for increased performance. PCI Express 5.0 and dual-channel DDR5 ECC memory at 5600 MHz are also supported by the Core i5-13600K. The Core i5-13600K has integrated Intel UHD 770 Graphics. It provides quick, rich 3D performance for high-quality images, with support for one 7680 x 4320 resolution 8K monitor or up to four 3840 x 2160 resolution 4K monitors with great dynamic range. The Intel 13th Gen Core i5 13600K Processor comes with a 03-year warranty.

reviews.message: It's a very power-full Processor. Very Good for Gaming and Overclocking.
I am satisfied with the performance of this processor.

products.name: Intel 13th Gen Core i5 13400F Raptor Lake Processor
products.description: The Intel 13th Gen Core i5 13400F Processor is compatible with LGA1700 Sockets. With 10 total cores and 16 total threads, this CPU is ideal for gamers and heavy users. It also has a new Raptor Cove CPU core and is built on the ESF 'Intel 7' manufacturing node at 10nm. With a clock speed of up to 2.50 GHz, this CPU will provide you with the necessary power. With eight low-voltage Efficient-cores managing background operations for multitasking and six 2.50 GHz Performance-cores powering applications and games, the Core i5-13400F is intended to give outstanding performance for daily workloads. The integrated Intel Thread Director ensures that the two work in tandem by dynamically and intelligently assigning workloads to the right core at the appropriate time. The memory type of this processor is DDR5-4800; this CPU supports high-speed DDR5 memory, which provides excellent performance. This CPU can accommodate up to 128 GB of RAM, making it ideal for demanding users. This CPU has two memory channels, providing excellent performance and versatility.

reviews.message: It's a very power-full Processor. Very Good for budget Gaming.

products.name: Intel 13th Gen Core i5 13500 Raptor Lake Processor
products.description: The Intel 13th Generation Core i5 13500 Processor is LGA1700 Socket compatible. With 14 cores, this CPU can easily handle even the most demanding workloads. It can also effectively boost its core count to 20 threads owing to Intel Hyper-Threading. It also includes 24MB of L3 cache. The Core i5-13500 features 24MB of L3 cache and runs at 2.5 GHz by default, with the ability to turbo to 4.8 GHz depending on the workload. So you may be confident that your processor will be able to meet your demands. This CPU is manufactured on a 10 nm technology and has a locked multiplier, which limits its overclocking potential. With a TDP of only 65 W, it nevertheless provides excellent performance. DDR4 and DDR5 memory with a dual-channel interface is also supported by the Core i5-13500. It communicates with other system components through a PCI-Express Gen 5 link. This CPU also includes the UHD Graphics 770 integrated graphics solution. The Core i5-13500 also supports virtualization, which enhances virtual machine performance significantly. This CPU includes the integrated graphics solution UHD Graphics 770.

reviews.message: One of the best processor in this budget.
Very very satisfied with this processor.

products.name: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G Processor with Radeon Graphic
products.description: The AMD Ryzen 5 5600G Processor with Radeon Graphics is built in intelligence featuring 6 processor cores, 12 threads, and an astonishingly efficient 45-65W TDP. In this processor, It stands with 3.9GHz Base Clock, 4.4GHz Max Boost Clock, 3MB L2 Cache, 16MB L3 Cache with AM4 Package and TSMC 7nm FinFET CMOS. This processor is built with PCIe 3.0 x8 and Wraith Spire Thermal Solution. The AMD Ryzen 5 5600G Processor provides DDR4 Up to 3200MHz memory with 2 memory channels. With the high processing capability, this processor is also integrated with Radeon Graphics. The processor has a graphics frequency of 1900MHz and a graphics Core count of 7. The AMD Ryzen 5 5600G Processor is built for modern business, AMD technologies provide layers of protection, seamless manageability, and reliable longevity.

The Asus TUF GAMING Alliance is a cooperation between ASUS and well-known PC component manufacturers to assure compatibility across a wide variety of parts, including PC cases, power supplies, CPU coolers, memory kits, and more. The TUF GAMING Alliance will grow even stronger as new collaborations and components are added regularly. The Asus TUF GAMING B760M motherboards offer a feature-rich high-performance gaming package, including ultrafast networking for smoother online gameplay, pristine audio with positional cues for FPS gaming, and onboard RGB lighting that syncs with connected gear to personalize your gaming environment.

It features an 8+2+1 Duet Rail Power System, Digital PWM, Core Boost, and DDR4 Boost. products.name: Corsair VENGEANCE RGB 32GB (2x16GB) DDR5 5200MHz C40 AMD EXPO RAM Kit
products.description: The Corsair VENGEANCE RGB 32GB (2x16GB) DDR5 5200MHz C40 AMD EXPO RAM Kit is a high-performance memory kit designed for AMD motherboards. With a capacity of 32GB, it provides ample memory for demanding tasks and applications. The DDR5 technology ensures faster data transfer rates and improved overall performance compared to its DDR4 counterparts. Operating at a frequency of 5200MHz, this RAM kit delivers exceptional speed and responsiveness, allowing for smooth multitasking and seamless gaming experiences. The 288-pin form factor ensures compatibility with most modern motherboards, providing easy installation and setup. The voltage and CAS latency of the Corsair VENGEANCE RGB DDR5 RAM are optimized for efficient performance. With a voltage of 1.25V and a CAS latency of C40, the RAM operates at an optimal power level while maintaining low latency for faster data access. This RAM kit is the ten-zone RGB lighting. The RGB lighting adds a vibrant and customizable visual element to your PC, allowing you to personalize the aesthetics and create stunning lighting effects. You can sync the lighting with other compatible RGB components to create a unified lighting theme throughout your system. The Corsair VENGEANCE RGB 32GB DDR5 RAM Kit is an excellent choice for users who prioritize performance and aesthetics. It offers high-speed DDR5 memory, optimized for AMD motherboards, and features customizable RGB lighting to enhance the visual appeal of your cutting-edge PC build.

reviews.message: It looks Stunning! And the performance is beast.
The best one i have ever choose.

products.name: G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM
products.description: The G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM is a high-performance memory module built for desktop PCs. It has a capacity of 32GB and is designed with DDR5 memory. To function properly, the G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM requires a voltage of 1.40V. It is unbuffered and non-ECC, making it perfect for professional or high-performance gaming. The SPD speed is 4800 MT/s, and the voltage is set to 1.10V by default. The G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM is Intel XMP 3.0 (Extreme Memory Profile) Compatible, which is one of its notable qualities. This implies that it has been verified and certified to operate with Intel-based motherboards that support XMP, making it simple and quick to configure the RAM's performance parameters. The G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM offers RGB illumination that can be configured to fit the aesthetics of your computer design, in addition to its amazing performance specs. Overall, this RAM module is an excellent option for gamers, content creators, and professionals that want exceptional speed and dependability from their computer's memory.

products.name: Deepcool DQ850M-V3L 850W 80 Plus Bronze Full Modular Power Supply
products.description: Deepcool DQ850M-V3L 850W is a Full Modular Power Supply with 80 Plus Bronze certification. This new Deepcool power supply is made entirely of Japanese capacitors and employs high-quality switch MOSFETs. The DQ850M-V3L is designed to provide stable output capacity with high conversion efficiency, improving the reliability of your PC system. The Deepcool Full Modular Power Supply is 80 PLUS Bronze Certified, so you'll get all the power you need while saving up to 91.2% on energy consumption and waste heat. The DQ850M-V3L delivers improved performance with lower power dissipation, increased quality, and better thermals to meet your needs. It has active Power Factor Correction (PFC), a full bridge LLC resonant converter, and synchronous rectification DC-DC design. The 120mm silent fan in this PSU has a temperature control feature to maintain low noise. tight fan curve, quiet operation, and quiet operation. The Circuit Shield in this Power Supply shields your PSU from issues with irregular voltage and current, such as shorting, over-powering, and overheating.

products.name: Lian Li SP750 Performance SFX 80 PLUS Gold Fully Modular Power Supply
products.description: The Lian Li SP750 Performance SFX Power Supply is a stylish high-performance PSU that perfectly fits small-form-factor PCs while supporting power-hungry components. It comes with an 80 PLUS Gold Certificate so it can guarantee up to 92% efficiency, ensuring less power wastage. The Lian Li SP750 features a 92mm hydraulic bearing fan that operates at zero RPM mode until 40% load in order to achieve minimal acoustic levels. This PSU features Premium Japanese electrolytic capacitors that provide great durability and long-term reliability, as well as offering the highest stability. This fully modular power supply provides all necessary braided cables right out of the box, ensuring less cable clutter and more aesthetics. It comes with 1 x 24 / 20-Pin motherboard connector (300mm) x 1pcs, 2 x 8 / 4-Pin CPU / ATX 12V connector (450mm-70mm) x 1 pcs, 1 x 8 / 6+2 Pin PCIe connector (400mm) x 1pcs, 2 x 8 / 6+2 Pin PCIe connector (400mm-120mm) x 1pcs, 4 x SATA connector (120mm-120mm-120mm-120mm) x 2pcs, and 4 x 4-Pin Peripheral connector (120mm-120mm-120mm-120mm) x 1pcs. The Lian Li SP750 comes with 5 years of warranty.

The front panel of the card features a variety of outputs, such as DisplayPort 2.0 and HDMI 2.1. products.name: MSI GeForce RTX 4080 16GB GAMING X TRIO GDDR6X Graphics Card
products.description: The MSI GeForce RTX 4080 16GB GAMING X TRIO GDDR6X Graphics Card brings an enormous leap in performance, efficiency, and AI-powered graphics. It lets you experience ultra-high-performance gaming, incredibly detailed virtual worlds with ray tracing, unprecedented productivity, and new ways to create. It’s powered by the NVIDIA Ada Lovelace architecture and comes with 16 GB of G6X memory to deliver the ultimate experience for gamers and creators. The MSI GeForce RTX 4080 16GB GAMING X TRIO features TRI FROZR 3 Thermal Design. Fan blades linked by ring arcs and a fan cowl work together to stabilize and maintain high-pressure airflow. The heat from the GPU and memory modules is captured by a copper baseplate and then rapidly transferred to Core Pipes. The heat from the GPU and memory modules is immediately captured by a solid nickel-plated copper baseplate and then rapidly transferred to an array of heat pipes. This widening of the thermal transfer systems with highly efficient mechanisms improves overall efficiency. Fins with a V-shaped cutout are located at the airflow passthrough to improve flow efficiency. MSI GeForce RTX 4080 16GB GAMING X TRIO comes with Dual BIOS that gives you the choice to prioritize full performance in GAMING mode or low noise in SILENT mode. It comes with a bundled support bracket that can be attached to your PC case for additional graphics card reinforcement. The MSI GeForce RTX 4080 16GB GAMING X TRIO comes with 3 years warranty.

products.name: GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24GB GDDR6X Graphics Card
products.description: The GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24G Graphics Card is integrated with a 24GB GDDR6X 384-bit memory interface and it features NVIDIA Ada Lovelace Streaming Multiprocessors. It is equipped with advanced 4th Generation Tensor Cores for up to 2X AI performance and 3rd Generation RT Cores for up to 2X ray tracing performance. GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24G is equipped with some special features such as a WINDFORCE cooling system, LCD Edge View, RGB Fusion 2.0, 4 video outputs, and a Protection metal backplate. The WINDFORCE cooling system features three 110mm newly designed bionic shark fans, alternate spinning, 13 composite copper heat pipes, a large vapor chamber directly touching the GPU, 3D active fans, and Screen cooling, which together provide high-efficiency heat dissipation. The double ball bearing structure has better heat endurance and efficiency than the sleeve structure. The 3D Active Fan provides semi-passive cooling, and the fans will remain off when the GPU is in a low load or low power game. The LCD monitor of the GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24G Graphics Card not only displays graphics card information, but also various favorite texts, pictures, and GIFs. The legendary three-ring lighting provides excellent visual enjoyment. You can choose any lighting effect or synchronize it with other devices in the GIGABYTE CONTROL CENTER. The GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24G Graphics Card features Dual Bios. The factory default setting is OC mode, which provides users with the best performance. However, switching to silent mode will enjoy a quieter experience. The metal back plate not only provides an aesthetical shape but also enhances the structure of the graphics card to provide complete protection. GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24GB features the new anti-sag bracket tailored to each graphics card. It provides optimized reinforcement and a better overall visual appearance. The GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24G comes with 3 years of warranty.

products.description: The Razer Huntsman Elite Opto-Mechanical Clicky Switch Gaming Keyboard utilizes optical technology for actuation, combined with a new switch design for actuation at the speed of light. And with optical actuation providing less physical contact, you get the durability of up to 100 million keystrokes.

products.name: ASUS P707 ROG Spatha X Dual-mode RGB Gaming Mouse
products.description: ASUS P707 ROG Spatha X is a Dual-mode RGB Gaming Mouse from ASUS. This wireless gaming mouse features dual-mode connectivity, allowing you to play wirelessly via RF 2.4 GHz or traditionally with a wired USB-CÂ® connection. A specially tuned 19,000 dpi sensor lets you take down opponents swiftly with extreme accuracy, while 12 programmable buttons ensure all commands are at your fingertips. In addition, ROG Spatha X features exclusive push-fit switch sockets, ROG Micro Switch, Aura Sync RGBs, and a magnetic charging dock.

products.name: Logitech G502 X PLUS LIGHTSPEED Wireless Hero RGB Gaming Mouse White
products.description: Logitech G502 X PLUS LIGHTSPEED Wireless Hero RGB Gaming Mouse has been completely redone with the newest gaming technology, including as our first-ever LIGHTFORCE hybrid switches, LIGHTSPEED pro-grade wifi, LIGHTSYNC RGB, and HERO 25K Optical Sensor. In order to never run out of power, the Logitech G502 X LIGHTSPEED Gaming Mouse is also compatible with POWERPLAY. Higher levels of speed and reliability are attained by cutting-edge hybrid optical-mechanical switches due to optical actuation. Professional-grade connectivity with a new protocol that achieves a response rate that is 68% quicker than the previous version. The G502 X also achieves up to 130 hours of battery life with RGB off and 37 hours when RGB is set to always on because to the remarkable efficiency of LIGHTSPEED technology. Hyperfast mode allows you to easily spin the lighter wheel. To scroll precisely, simply click to enter ratcheted mode. To access two more completely programmable controls, tilt left and right. This compact mouse may be adjusted for a variety of games and programs. Before needing to be recharged through the USB Type-C connector, Logitech G502 X PLUS LIGHTSPEED Wireless Hero RGB Gaming Mouse's built-in battery is expected to last up to 140 hours of gameplay or 37 hours with the RGB lights on.

Designed to be a true extension of a gamer, this deadly predator comes with our most cutting-edge technology and is ready to sink its fangs into the competition. 25% faster than any other wireless technology available, you wonâ€™t even realize that youâ€™re gaming with a wireless mouse due to its high-speed transmission, lowest click latency, and seamless frequency switching in the noisiest, data-saturated environments. Our new, improved sensor has an industry-leading 20,000 DPI with 99.6% resolution accuracy,

reviews.message: Best mouse i have ever used.

products.name: Edifier STAX SPIRIT S3 Wireless Over-Ear Headphone
products.description: The Edifier STAX S3 Wireless Over-Ear Headphone is a flagship headphone created without compromise for stunning Hi-Res audio. This headphone is equipped with planar magnetic drivers to produce a cleaner sound with greater resolution and better imaging that's true to professional audio recordings. It also features The all-new Edifier EqualMass diaphragm technology that combines trusted and iconic components, including the Audeze Fluxor magnetic structure, Uniforce diaphragm, and Fazor phase management, accurately reproduce the original sound.

products.name: Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone
products.description: The Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone is a premium RGB gaming headset with high definition sound, simulated 7.1 surround sound, and AI noise cancellation for a truly immersive gaming experience. It has a high-fidelity ESS 9280 Quad DACTM and 50 mm ASUS Precision speakers for strong bass and realistic sound quality. It also includes ROG AI Beamforming Microphones with AI Noise Cancelation to filter out background noise and improve voice quality. To balance the gameplay audio and in-game dialogue, you may quickly modify the game chat volume. Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone comes with a variety of customization choices, pre-set light effects, and multi-color RGB lighting with over 16.8 million colors to fit your style and mood. It also offers a lightweight and comfy design with ergonomic ear cushions that fit securely on your ears. The 3.5 mm, USB-C ®, and USB-A ports on the Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone make it compatible with PCs, Macs, PlayStation®, Nintendo SwitchTM, Xbox, and mobile devices. The Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone will give you an excellent and immersive gaming experience whether you are playing, streaming, or listening to music.

products.name: RODE NTH-100M Professional Over-ear Headset
products.description: The RODE NTH-100M is a professional over-ear headset that combines exceptional audio performance with a broadcast-grade headset microphone. The NTH-100M offers flawless audio and crystal-clear voice capture in an incredibly cozy and fashionable package, making it ideal for anyone working in the media or broadcast industry, podcasting, streaming, gaming, or working from home or the office.
